metadata.title: BMC Public Health Delayed Treatment of Diagnosed Pulmonary Tuberculosis in Taiwan

abstract.original_text: Background: Mycobacterium tuberculosis infection is an ongoing public health problem in Taiwan. The National Tuberculosis Registry Campaign, a case management system, was implemented in 1997. This study examined this monitoring system to identify and characterize delayed treatment of TB patients.
